titles.title: Recognizing the accomplishments and contributions of the Director General of the World Intellectual Property Organization, Arpad Bogsch, on the occasion of his conclusion of service with that body.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

bill.summary: 9/4/1997--Introduced. Recognizes the accomplishments and contributions of Arpad Bogsch, the Director General of the World Intellectual Property Organization, on the occasion of his conclusion of service with that body.
